channel.title: X-mini Happy Capsule speakers review on Shantanu Vs The World
channel.description: Recent content in X-mini Happy Capsule speakers review on Shantanu Vs The World

item.title: Review of X-Mini Capsule Happy Speakers
item.author: shantanu@shantanugoel.com (Shantanu Goel)
item.description: I received a few portable speakers as review pieces from x-mini a few days ago. I tried all of them but thought of posting a review of the most interesting model out of the lot, which is the X-mini Happy. Would also be posting a review soon of one more model that I liked quite a bit which is the X-mini Max II. In The Package
